title: GetEventParameters (Method)
text:
METHOD GetEventParameters : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the value of the Event_Parameters-Property of this BACnet-EventEnrollment-Property. The returned pointer
pEventParam is allocated with the corresponding data, whereas the user has to use
FreeStackAllocatedMemory
, to free
the allocated memory after data usage.

rows.Name: pEventParam
rows.Comment:
The returned Pointer gets filled with the data of IEC_BACNET_EVENT_PARAMETER AND (!) the data referenced within evtParams.
After usage, useFreeStackAllocatedMemory, to free the used memory again.
